overview: From #LetsDoeIt and WhiteBoxxx, “Behind the Mask” is a well-lit gonzo with warm, white interior sets, featuring mouthwateringly appetizing young babes — including the fantastic Baby Nicols, Liya Silver and Emily Cutie — with a nice mixture of masturbation, girl-girl, boy-girl, and ménage à trois (as in, boy-girl-girl), all of which are tastefully yet arousingly shot by director Louis Moiré.
title: Behind the Mask
